next_jobs.title: Map Global News/Finance Data Sources
next_jobs.instructions: List and validate APIs, RSS feeds, and web sources for real-time finance/news data. Output to config/markets.yaml.

next_jobs.title: Implement News/Finance Harvester
next_jobs.instructions: Develop src/harvesters/news_finance.py to ingest, normalize, and store news/finance data. Log results in ops/logs/AUTORUN_LOG.md.

next_jobs.title: Build Arbitrage Scanner
next_jobs.instructions: Create src/engines/arbitrage_scanner.py to detect price discrepancies across markets. Output actionable signals.

next_jobs.title: Draft Revenue Engine Models
next_jobs.instructions: Document three revenue engines in docs/REVENUE_ENGINES.md, detailing data resale, subscription, and arbitrage execution.

next_jobs.title: Write Unit Tests for Harvesters and Scanners
next_jobs.instructions: Add tests in tests/ for news harvester and arbitrage scanner modules.
